means: （使）（金属）汞齐化( amalgamate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The chemical companies had amalgamated into a vast conglomerate.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些化学品公司已经合并成一个庞大的企业集团。

sentence.Network_en: The firm has amalgamated with an American company.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司和一家美国公司合并了。

sentence.Network_en: The company has now amalgamated with another local firm.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司现在已与当地一家公司合并了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...  安全共同体意指不以战争解决争端的高度融合的人群或组织,具体分为两类,一是整合型,amalgamated,是由多个实体组合而成的国家,比如美国,二是多元型,pluralistic,即由彼此独立的民族国家集.
amalgamate 汞齐化作用, amalgamated 汞齐化了的, amalgamate 调拌汞合金
the amalgamated zinc powder as anode materials used in alkaline zinc manganese dioxide can effectively retrain the gas production from battery itself .碱性锌锰电池的阳极锌粉，采用汞齐化方法抑制气体的产生具有很好的效果。

list.abs: sodium aluminate 铝酸钠sodium amalgam 钠汞齐sodium amide 钠胺
amalgam 汞齐amalgam cell 汞齐电池amalgam electrode 汞齐电极
化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译(A-C)1 ... amalgam cell 汞齐电池 amalgam electrode 汞齐电极 amalgamation 汞齐化.
amalgam carrier 汞合金输送器amalgam carver 汞合金雕刻刀amalgam cell 汞齐电池

entry.def: When two or more things, especially organizations, amalgamate or are amalgamated, they become one large thing.

example.ex: The firm has amalgamated with an American company...
example.tran: 该公司和一家美国公司合并了。

example.ex: The chemical companies had amalgamated into a vast conglomerate...
example.tran: 那些化学品公司已经合并成一个庞大的企业集团。

auth_sentence.content: The old Daily Post, afterwards amalgamated with another journal.
auth_sentence.res_content: The old Daily Post, afterwards amalgamated with another journal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The old Daily Post, afterwards amalgamated with another journal.

auth_sentence.content: Creationists must understand that religion and science cannot be amalgamated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Creationists must understand that religion and science cannot be amalgamated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Creationists must understand that religion and science cannot be amalgamated.

auth_sentence.content: Once amalgamated, the data from the spreadsheets frequently is stale.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once amalgamated, the data from the spreadsheets frequently is stale.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once amalgamated, the data from the spreadsheets frequently is stale.
